title: A question about how league of legends handles it's Win streaks and lose streaks
body:
[**Hello League **

_  I think this has gone through the minds of many league players when you're doing well and on a hot win streak and then suddenly it stops not even met with a win or a loss ratio, it's met with an impressive losing streak that encourages some regrettable things such as uninstalling the game. I don't hate league I've had a lot of fun playing it but I've had this question for quite some time and it's been in the back of my mind. Is there a program, a code, a set of codes, an algorithm, anything, that would increase or decrease your chances of winning? I've been on losing streaks that lasted up to 25 games not straight of course it would take all week to get there, then it would stop followed by extremely long winning streaks, then sometimes an even ratio of wins and losses. No matter the answer I will continue to play and support League of Legends. However I would like to know if there is a factor that could determine whether or not you lose a game besides the skill, but perhaps people you get placed within a team and I know sometimes it is a skill thing, for me at least._

PS if your having a bad game just watch these videos that are totally not midget porn!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VKrlYt_IFwc&t=5148s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eY52Zsg-KVI&t=10789s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TL6zY0LvGRM

replies.body:
There isn't really a program that would help you win more often that's not an illegal script of some kind =\ . 

Y'know.....technically this doesn't really belong in Help & Support but these videos are just the heckin' best. 

IT STAYS

Thanks for the quick reply sorry about the topic being posted in the wrong category I wasn't too sure on what topic to put this question under. I'm glad you enjoyed the videos! They make me happy and I wanted to share that with others  :)
